declarations.name: ButtonComponent
declarations.description:
Customized built-in element that renders a styled button.

`ButtonComponent` is displayed contextually as one of three variants: primary, secondary or icon. The variant is set using a CSS classname. The label is set via the content of the `HTMLButtonElement`. When displayed as the icon variant, ButtonComponent expects two direct children: `HTMLSVGElement` and `HTMLSpanElement` that displays a label exclusively for screen readers using the `hidden` HTML attribute.

declarations.name: CardComponent
declarations.description:
Autonomous custom element that renders a card container.
`CardComponent` displays content in a header, content, footer layout.

declarations.name: DialogComponent
declarations.description:
Controller for rendering a dialog from HTML template.

`DialogComponent` requires an instance of `DialogStack` to be set on `window.__dialogStack` prior to instantiation. After specifying a `template`, `target`, and `variant` with HTML attributes, `DialogComponent` will display either a modal or tooltip that renders a HTML template.

declarations.name: ModalComponent
TooltipComponent
TextInputComponent
TableComponent
declarations.description:
Renders a stylized `HTMLTableElement` that can display read-only or editable.
`TableComponent` is a customized built-in element that renders columns and rows through events dispatched on `BroadcastChannel`.

declarations.name: TdComponent
TrComponent
TableCardComponent
declarations.description:
Renders a `TableComponent` in a stylized card
that displays buttons used for CRUD in the table.

Customized built-in element that renders a styled button.

`ButtonComponent` is displayed contextually as one of three variants: primary, secondary or icon. The variant is set using a CSS classname. The label is set via the content of the `HTMLButtonElement`. When displayed as the icon variant, ButtonComponent expects two direct children: `HTMLSVGElement` and `HTMLSpanElement` that displays a label exclusively for screen readers using the `hidden` HTML attribute.
declarations.name: ButtonComponent

attributes.description: "in-button", Required

declarations.description:
Controller for rendering a dialog from HTML template.

`DialogComponent` requires an instance of `DialogStack` to be set on `window.__dialogStack` prior to instantiation. After specifying a `template`, `target`, and `variant` with HTML attributes, `DialogComponent` will display either a modal or tooltip that renders a HTML template.
declarations.name: DialogComponent

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Selector that targets the HTML element that triggers the dialog on click, for use with `querySelector`, Required

attributes.name: template
attributes.description: Required, Selector that targets the HTML template, for use with `querySelector`.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Specifies whether to display a "modal" or "tooltip", Required

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of form control

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: A value is required or must be check for the form to be submittable

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.description: Minimum length (number of characters) of value

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Maximum length (number of characters) of value

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: Pattern the value must match to be valid

attributes.name: list
attributes.description: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: The value is not editable

attributes.name: spellcheck
attributes.description: Defines whether the element may be checked for spelling errors.
Size of the control
attributes.name: size
